home.title: Home
home.excerpt: World-champion Sphynx cats and kittens from the Miss Mermaid family.
home.content:
World-Champion Sphynx Cattery

Different is Beautiful. We raise confident, affectionate Sphynx companions with unmatched pedigree and care.

Start Adoption Journey

Champion Lines

Carefully paired queens and studs with international titles and genetic screening.

Holistic Care

Warm habitats, custom nutrition, and daily enrichment for thriving personalities.

Lifetime Support

Dedicated guardianship guidance, wellness checklists, and alumni community.

about.title: About
about.excerpt: Meet the Miss Mermaid · Sphynx cattery team and story.
about.content:
Our Miss Mermaid Promise

Decades of feline expertise, wellness partnerships, and show-ring achievements define the Miss Mermaid ethos. Every cat is nurtured as family before joining yours.

  • International Cat Association award recipients
  • Certified veterinary technician on-site
  • Ethical breeding standards with transparency

sphynx.title: Sphynx
sphynx.excerpt: Discover the unique traits and care of Sphynx cats.
sphynx.content:
Why Sphynx Cats Steal Hearts

Graceful, inquisitive, and delightfully social, Sphynx cats thrive on companionship. Their hairless coats reveal every expression and demand elevated care.

"Our Sphynx are sculpted by love and science."

Lead Breeder • Miss Mermaid

kittens.title: Kittens
kittens.excerpt: Upcoming litters, reservations, and health assurances.
kittens.content:
Future Litters & Nursery Updates

Reserve early to join our curated waitlist. Each kitten completes social milestones, wellness exams, and temperament testing before homecoming.

  • Reservation fee applied to adoption
  • Weekly photo updates
  • Comprehensive health dossier

adoption.title: Adoption
adoption.content:
Adoption in Five Careful Steps

  1. Apply with lifestyle and habitat details.
  2. Meet our guardianship coordinator for alignment.
  3. Secure your match with reservation confirmation.
  4. Prepare home with tailored care blueprint.
  5. Celebrate homecoming with follow-up wellness calls.

We stay beside you from inquiry through every milestone.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.excerpt: Timeline of Miss Mermaid · Sphynx accolades.
achievements.content:
Milestones on the World Stage

  • 2018 — First international Best in Show title.
  • 2020 — Genetic health excellence certification.
  • 2022 — Champion queens ranked top three globally.
  • 2024 — Launch of Miss Mermaid wellness retreat.

contact.title: Contact
contact.excerpt: Reach the Miss Mermaid guardianship team.
contact.content:
We Would Love to Hear From You

Email our team at hello@sphynx.local.mermaid or book a virtual nursery tour.

Fluent Forms powers our detailed enquiry process for tailored matches.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.content:
Frequently Asked Questions

How do I care for their skin?

Weekly spa rituals, hypoallergenic wipes, and moisturising balms keep Sphynx skin radiant.

What diets do you recommend?

High-protein, taurine-rich meals with hydration boosters, tailored per kitten.

Do they feel cold?

Yes, they love warm laps, knitwear, and climate-controlled snuggle zones.
